data.title: Details information of our branches in Mainland
data.meta_description: Address, contact number, working hours, and other detailed information you may need for our branches. Together, we thrive.
data.text:
What services do we provide

We provide Wealth Management and limited non-cash services.

Our Wealth Management services will continue to operate as normal, helping you assess your risk appetite based on your needs with a comprehensive assessment and offering investment products that suit you the most.

Limited non-cash services include account opening, account information amendment and general enquiries, etc.

For more details, please consult our branch customer service representatives or contact our 24-hours Customer Service Hotline at 95366.

Please dial the country code of mainland China +86 if you are calling from overseas, Hong Kong SAR, Macau SAR, or Taiwan

New Year Holiday: Branch to be closed on Dec 31st 2023 and Jan 1st 2024, open on Dec 30th 2023

Spring Festival: Branch to be closed from Feb 10th to 17th

Qing Ming Festival: Branch to be closed on Apr 4th to 5th, open on Apr 6th

Labor Day Holiday: Branch to be closed from May 1st to May 4th, open on May 5th

Dragon Boat Festival: Branch to be closed on Jun 9th and 10th, open on Jun 8th

Mid-Autumn Festival: Branch to be closed on Sep 16th to 17th, open on Sep 15th

National Day Holiday: Branch to be closed from Oct 1st to Oct 7th

What services do we provide ?

We provide Wealth Management and limited non-cash services.

Our Wealth Management services will continue to operate as normal, helping you assess your risk appetite based on your needs with a comprehensive assessment and offering investment products that suit you the most.

Limited non-cash services include account opening, account information amendment and general enquiries, etc.

For more details, please consult our branch customer service representatives or contact our 24-hours Customer Service Hotline at 95366.

Please dial the country code of mainland China +86 if you are calling from overseas, Hong Kong SAR, Macau SAR, or Taiwan.
